        public ScaledImageComponent(java.lang.String name,
                            java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Double> widthScalar,
                            java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Double> heightScalar,
                            java.awt.Component referenceComponent,
                            boolean keepRatio)
        Instantiates a new Scaled image component.
        Parameters:
        name - the name
        widthScalar - the width scalar
        heightScalar - the height scalar
        referenceComponent - the reference component
        keepRatio - the keep ratio

      • ScaledImageComponent

        public ScaledImageComponent(java.lang.String name,
                            double widthScalar,
                            double heightScalar,
                            java.awt.Component referenceComponent,
                            boolean keepRatio)
        ScaledImageConstructor scaled by width and height relative to referenceComponent. If the keepRatio is true, the image will try to be as big as possible but will respect the following constraints :
        • Stay lower than a width percentage of the screen (calculated as widthScalar * referenceComponent.getWidth())
        • Stay lower than a height percentage of the screen (calculated as heightScalar * referenceComponent.getHeight())
        Parameters:
        name - name of the image
        widthScalar - the widthScalar of the image
        heightScalar - the heightScalar of the image
        referenceComponent - referenceComponent used to scale the image
        keepRatio - keep the ratio of the image or not

      • ScaledImageComponent

        public ScaledImageComponent(java.lang.String name,
                            java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Double> widthScalar,
                            java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.Double> heightScalar,
                            java.awt.Component referenceComponent)
        Instantiates a new Scaled image component.
        Parameters:
        name - the name
        widthScalar - the width scalar
        heightScalar - the height scalar
        referenceComponent - the reference component

      • ScaledImageComponent

        public ScaledImageComponent(java.lang.String name,
                            double widthScalar,
                            double heightScalar,
                            java.awt.Component referenceComponent)
        ScaledImageConstructor scaled by width and height relative to referenceComponent. The image try to be as big as possible but respect the following constraints :
        • Stay lower than a width percentage of the screen (calculated as widthScalar * referenceComponent.getWidth())
        • Stay lower than a height percentage of the screen (calculated as heightScalar * referenceComponent.getHeight())
        Parameters:
        name - name of the image
        widthScalar - the widthScalar of the image
        heightScalar - the heightScalar of the image
        referenceComponent - referenceComponent used to scale the image
